rubric_items.passed_description: App uses the Design Support library and its provided widget types (`FloatingActionButton`, `AppBarLayout`, `SnackBar`, etc).
rubric_items.criteria: App uses the Design Support library and its provided widget types (FloatingActionButton, AppBarLayout, SnackBar, etc).

rubric_items.passed_description: App uses `CoordinatorLayout` for the main Activity.
rubric_items.criteria: App uses `CoordinatorLayout` for the main Activity.
App uses an app bar and associated toolbars.

rubric_items.passed_description: App provides a Floating Action Button for the most common action(s).
rubric_items.criteria: App provides a Floating Action Button for the most common action(s).

rubric_items.passed_description: App properly specifies elevations for app bars, FABs, and other elements specified in the [Material Design specification](http://www.google.com/design/spec/material-design/introduction.html).
rubric_items.criteria: App properly specifies elevations for app bars, FABs, and other elements specified in the [Material Design specification](http://www.google.com/design/spec/material-design/introduction.html).

rubric_items.passed_description: App has a consistent color theme defined in `styles.xml`. Color theme does not impact usability of the app.
rubric_items.criteria:
App has a consistent color theme defined in styles.xml.

Color theme does not impact usability of the app.

rubric_items.passed_description: App provides sufficient space between text and surrounding elements.
rubric_items.criteria: App provides sufficient space between text and surrounding elements.

rubric_items.passed_description: App uses images that are high quality, specific, and full bleed.
rubric_items.criteria: App uses images that are high quality, specific, and full bleed.

rubric_items.passed_description: App uses fonts that are either the Android defaults, are complementary, and aren't otherwise distracting.
rubric_items.criteria: App uses fonts that are either the Android defaults, are complementary, and aren't otherwise distracting.

rubric_items.passed_description: App conforms to common standards found in the  [Android Nanodegree General Project Guidelines](http://udacity.github.io/android-nanodegree-guidelines/core.html).
rubric_items.criteria: App conforms to common standards found in the  [Android Nanodegree General Project Guidelines](http://udacity.github.io/android-nanodegree-guidelines/core.html).

rubric_items.passed_description: App utilizes stable release versions of all libraries, Gradle, and Android Studio.
rubric_items.criteria: Submission must use stable release versions of all libraries, Gradle, and Android Studio. Debug/beta/canary versions are not acceptable.
